title: Dungeon and mini-dungeon passes
body: What are the missions and mission rewards that you get once you purchase either one? I wasn't on when they got released so I have no idea.

replies.body: The missions will depend on the pass obtained!  We've broken down these missions in our [announcement page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/learn-more-arcade-boss-world-event) here.  Keep in mind, though, that the Daily Missions are bundled with the passes that include them.
